title: A completely serious, totally legit question for Riot.
body:
So. Shyvana.

Classic Shyvana is fire.

Ice Drake Shyvana is ice.

How can we not have a lightning-based Shyvana skin called Statikk Shyv?

Come on.

replies.body: Would upvote again.
I wish there was an animation so dragon Shyvana could fly.
Like her R?
thats not flying, thats like an extended jump =p
no, that's falling with *style*.
dammit, I was so hoping no one had made that joke yet
Made my day
Same here
So, do you build exclusively Statikk Shiv on Statikk {{champion:102}} ?  I love it.

That's a SHOCKINGLY good build right there.
I'll leave now. Where's the door?
Phreak confirmed
Quite a shocker.
It's like Draaaaaaven, but with shivs.
{{item:3087}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3087}}  and don't forget your trinket {{item:3087}}
Yes, sir, all 6 slots, sir.
The more Shyvs- I mean, Shivs you have on her, the more lightning there is. Go on, do it.
You sir have won the internet for today. Congratulations.
Statikk Shiv....oh gd im dieing, riot pls
BRUCE LEE BAAAAMMMM - chuck norris dead
Bruce Lee Sin
While we're on the topic of names can we get a name change on Popstar {{champion:103}}  to Popstarhi or is that name too lame?
*Popstahri
If we get Static Shyv, can we also get Pyro-Phoenix Anivia and ~~Zapdos~~ Voltcharge Anivia

More Shyvana skins, yes plz

Don't care if joke, gimme
Well done.
Puns of Damage. But seriously, this skin would look awesome!
Phreak better watch out, I have tons o' puns
Good show!
Agreed. Riot get your act together. We need a static shyv! Its not like you have one already.{{champion:102}} {{item:3087}}
I seriously hope this is coming soonâ„¢.  I don't even play Shyvana and I feel like this would be a nice joke skin (without being too obvious of the joke of course).
Take an upvote good sir, your puns must live on.
The champion portrait could be changed from {{champion:102}} to {{item:3087}}

I don't know... Lightning Dragons are too powerful and can cause statikk stuns... I'm not very optimistic when it comes to Shyvana, but...

I'll just say yes.
top kek
HAHAHAHAHAHA STATIK SHYV. dude srsly if i could honor you i would.
I thought you were gonna ask if they wanted to build a snowman.
Do we eventually get an avatar shyvana?
stattik shock !
This needs more up-votes.
Gods yes! We need this Riot!
They could do elemental ones... just be careful with an earth one. We don't want an original Lara Croft on our hands.
It's 2K18, can we finally get it Riot?
Its been 4 years... {{champion:32}}
this post is 4 years old, but still the best thing these boards have ever birthed.
Deep deep dabarooni
It would be a nice meme I agree!
